name: identify
description: reveals the true nature of an item or creature.

name: fire
description: hurls a bolt of fire at an enemy, dealing fire damage.

name: water
description: creates a torrent of water that damages enemies and can extinguish flames.

name: thunder
description: calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing thunder damage to a single target.

name: meteor
description: summons a shower of meteors from the sky, dealing fire damage to an area.

name: hurricane
description: creates a powerful whirlwind that damages and disorients enemies.

name: holy
description: heals the caster and nearby allies.

name: nix
description: creates a temporary shield that absorbs damage.

name: double_cast
description: allows the caster to cast the next spell twice.

name: aether_shield
description: creates a barrier around the caster that reflects damage back to the attacker.

name: regen
description: gradually restores the caster's health over time.

name: heal
description: heals a target ally for a moderate amount of health.
